Actions.Text: REFERRED TO RACING, GAMING AND WAGERING

Title: Enacts the "gamblers unfairly abused by reward dynamics (GUARD) act"
Summary: Prohibits mobile sports wagering operators from providing certain incentives to individuals for certain actions that tend to increase gambling activities.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to enacting the "gamblers unfairly abused by reward dynamics (GUARD) act"
